org.softlang.megal.plugins.impl.xml

Class XMLFragmentizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.softlang.megal.mi2.api.AbstractPlugin
      • org.softlang.megal.plugins.api.FragmentizerPlugin
        • org.softlang.megal.plugins.api.antlr.ANTLRFragmentizerPlugin<XMLParser,XMLLexer>
          • org.softlang.megal.plugins.impl.xml.XMLFragmentizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin, ANTLRBackedPlugin<XMLParser,XMLLexer>

    public class XMLFragmentizer
extends ANTLRFragmentizerPlugin<XMLParser,XMLLexer>
    Disassembles every XML artifact into XML fragments, that is XMLElement and XMLAttribute. Also disassembles XSD artifacts and other subsets of XML.
    Author:
    maxmeffert
